name: Ciara and the Witch's Cauldron
description:
A young girl's mother is bedridden with a disease beyond the ken of any physician. Desperate for a solution, she goes where none other would dare: to seek the wisdom of a witch.

But those who deal in magic live by strange ways - and keep themselves to themselves for a reason...

Content Warning

References to illness and death.

Credits

Coding, level design & UI by Philou
3D art & script by John Gabriel
Music & sound effects by Vela & John Gabriel

Featuring the vocal talents of

Loretta Chang as Líadan
 and Rachel Schumacher as Ciara

Ciara and the Witch's Cauldron was made for the fifty-third Godot Wild Jam.
